episodes.title: Scientology Indoctrination 101 - Part 2
episodes.description:
This week Jon Atack and I are continuing our review of the Scientology C/S-1, a step every Scientologist who gets mainline auditing does to prepare them for it. I think you'll see how this indoctrination is crucial to putting people into a mindset where Scientology will then "work." See you at 1pm MT/3pm ET on Sunday, November 12.

episodes.title: How to take back control from a cult
episodes.description: Recovering from a cult or other high control group isn't easy. Today I am live streaming with former Scientologist Jeff Beaumont to discuss different aspects of cult recovery that we used and other potential options for people trying to move on from a coercive situation.

episodes.title: Scientology Indoctrination 101
episodes.description:
In the place of my usual Critical Q&A this week, I am doing a special live stream with Jon Atack to go over some specific points of how indoctrination works in cults and specifically in Scientology with something we'll cover called the Scientology C/S-1. See you at 1pm MT/3pm ET on Sunday, Oct 15.
